Row.Text: Welcome to the lands of the Herero and the Namaqua! Forgive me if I'm inattentive - I've got a lot of business to attend to.
This is only a temporary setback. I'll be back before long!
I doubt you are prepared for the fury you have unleashed.
It's a bloody world, and I'll take my friends where I can get them. Would you be interested in a public Declaration of Friendship?
I have endured enough from you.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]([COLOR_WARNING_TEXT]They have publicly denounced us! NOTE: You are not at war.[ENDCOLOR])
The combined fury of the Herero and Namaqua will come roaring upon you.
If you encroach upon my lands, it can only end badly for you.
You've come crawling to me? Give me a reason I shouldn't slaughter you on the spot.
Oh, it's you! Always a welcome sight.
Hello there! Come get out of the sun.
Oh. I see you're here again.
Your soldiers have become reckless. If you do not redeploy them, I might become reckless as well.
What have you got for me?
I'm not defeated yet! I just need to rally my men and make a new plan...
I'd like to purchase these luxuries you're sporting. My armies need some morale.
There can be no reconciliation between us.
My men tire of walking the desert; could we perhaps sojourn into your lands?
Now you just insult me.
The times have not been kind to my people. If you have anything to spare, we would appreciate it.
I will weather any amount of scorn for my cause.
Coward! The fight is just beginning.
My people can now be free. I do not take this victory lightly.
